document_data.name: Treaty of Garumn's Gorge
document_data.observedby: [[Obould Many-Arrows]], [[Bruenor Battlehammer]], [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], [[Alustriel Silverhand]], [[Catti-brie]], [[Regis]], [[Galen Firth]], [[Emerus Warcrown]], [[Hralien]]
document_data.cause: Expansion of and ongoing assaults by the [[Many-Arrows]] tribe
document_data.outcome:
Peace between the Many-Arrows tribe and [[Clan Battlehammer]],
Establishment of the Kingdom of Many-Arrows
document_data.mainbody: The '''Treaty of Garumn's Gorge''', also known as the '''Many-Arrows treaty''',{{Cite dragon/429/Winning Races: Half-Orcs of the Many-Arrows Tribe|12-13}} was a treaty signed to ensure peace between an upcoming orc kingdom of the [[Silver Marches]] and others of the region.
